EBSU accepts ND upper credit in Science or Food Technology  
.  
EBSU and RSUST accept ND/HND.  
IBADAN does not accept 'A' level Zoology.  
IMSU and ABSU - No Direct Entry Admission.  
RHEMA, UDU, MINNA accept ND/HND lower credit in 
addition to the 'O' level credit passes in Mathematics, 
Biology, Chemistry and other Science subjects.  
AAU accepts only first degree and five (5) 'O' level credit 
passes in relevant subjects.  
AAUA accepts ND upper credit/HND lower credit in the 
relevant programmes.  
FUTA, the candidate must possess in addition to  the UTME 
requirements  two (2)  'A' level passes which must include 
Biology and either Chemistry or Mathematics. Holders of ND 
upper credit from a recognized institution  in relevant 
programmes are also eligible for admission.  
LAGOS accepts very good passes in the following three (3) 
JUPEB/A-level subjects: Biology, Chemistry, and Physics.  
FUNAAB – Same as in Biological Science.  
UMUDIKE and MINNA - Same as in                         Biochemistry. 
DELSU acc epts ND upper credit in Science Laboratory 
Technology.  
IGBINEDION accepts ND/NCE in Biology, Food Technology or 
Botany.  
COOU accepts ND/HND/NCE lower credit in any related  
Science programmes with Biology Major in the combination.
